title: Feng Shui Calculator
disclaimer: It's just for fun. Please don't take the results too seriously!
badFengShui: Bad Feng Shui (Major Adjustment or Remediation Needed)

lightPoor.label: Poor natural light
lightPoor.advice: Add windows or lighting devices, improve lighting.

ventilationPoor.label: Poor ventilation
ventilationPoor.advice: Install ventilation system or open flow channels to enhance air movement.

doorUnluckyDirection.label: Door facing west or northwest
doorUnluckyDirection.advice: Consider adjusting the door orientation or adding barriers to improve air flow.

doorMingTang.label: Bright hall in front of door (flat ground/pond/green grass)

doorLongCorridor.label: Door directly facing long corridor/street
doorLongCorridor.advice: Set up a screen or large plant inside the door to block and reduce direct air rush.

doorElevator.label: Door directly facing elevator
doorElevator.advice: Place round, large plants or screens at the door to cushion.

doorSeeStove.label: Seeing stove when opening door
doorSeeStove.advice: Use a screen or relocate the stove to avoid fire qi rushing towards the door.

doorSeeToilet.label: Seeing toilet when opening door
doorSeeToilet.advice: Set up a partition or adjust the door orientation to reduce filthy air entering the room.

doorSeeMirror.label: Seeing mirror when opening door
doorSeeMirror.advice: Adjust the mirror position so it doesn't directly reflect the view from the door.

entryDarkMessy.label: Dark and messy
entryDarkMessy.advice: Add lighting or rearrange to keep clean.

entrySharpCorner.label: Sharp corner (non-right angle wall or object)
entrySharpCorner.advice: Use plants or screens to block sharp corner attacks.

entryLowCeiling.label: Low ceiling and oppressive
entryLowCeiling.advice: Redesign the ceiling or use light colors to enhance space feeling.

livingSofaBackWater.label: Sofa backed by water or aquarium
livingSofaBackWater.advice: Adjust the sofa to back against solid wall or add screen for support.

livingSofaFaceDoor.label: Sofa directly facing door
livingSofaFaceDoor.advice: Adjust sofa angle or use partition to reduce evil qi.

livingDirectLight.label: Overhead light shining directly on head
livingDirectLight.advice: Relocate the light or use soft light shade.

livingIsolatedColumn.label: Isolated column blocking air flow
livingIsolatedColumn.advice: Enclose the column with furniture or attach landscape painting to resolve.

livingSharpCorner.label: Sharp corner (non-right angle wall or object)
livingSharpCorner.advice: Place tall plants or set up screen at sharp corner to exorcise evil qi.

bedFaceWest.label: Bed head facing west
bedFaceWest.advice: Adjust bed head direction to avoid blood rushing to head.

bedFaceMirror.label: Bed facing mirror
bedFaceMirror.advice: Adjust mirror position or cover with cloth.

studyDoorKitchenToilet.label: Door facing kitchen/toilet
studyDoorKitchenToilet.advice: Adjust study door orientation or add screen to block water-fire conflict.

studyWallToilet.label: Desk back or face wall of toilet
studyWallToilet.advice: Move desk to avoid toilet wall.

kitchenSouth.label: Kitchen facing south
kitchenSouth.advice: Consider adjusting kitchen position or adding partition to reduce fire qi.

kitchenStoveBadFacing.label: Stove directly facing door/bedroom/toilet
kitchenStoveBadFacing.advice: Adjust stove position to avoid collision with door.

kitchenStoveNoBack.label: Stove without back support
kitchenStoveNoBack.advice: Add solid wall or cabinet to enhance stability and safety.

diningRoundSquare.label: Dining table is round or square

diningSharpTable.label: Dining table is triangular or has sharp corners
diningSharpTable.advice: Replace table with round or square to improve qi field.

diningDoorCollision.label: Dining table directly hit by door/toilet
diningDoorCollision.advice: Adjust table position or set up screen to resolve evil qi.

toiletFaceDoor.label: Toilet directly facing door
toiletFaceDoor.advice: Change door orientation or add partition to reduce filthy air spreading.

toiletSameDoorKitchen.label: Same door as kitchen
toiletSameDoorKitchen.advice: Change door or add partition to avoid water-fire collision.
